title: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Vertical Vine and Scattered Flowers"
title_raw: Design for Textile Border with Vertical Vine and Scattered Flowers
medium: Gouache on paper, mounted on wood pulp board
description: Border design on maroon background: vertical gray-green vine and leaf strip intersected by small scattered pink, red, and blue flowers.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Vertical Vine and Scattered Flowers". Gouache on paper, mounted on wood pulp board. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-389.
